roleset.name: wash too frequently
roleset.note: OVERWASH-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from overwash.01-v)

example.name: just arg0
example.text: I had grade 2 acne and it was particularly bad when-4 I ' overwashed ' *T*-4 so I was compelled to wash less and to start moisturising -LRB- Nivea : Dry Skin , after washing or shaving -RRB- in my late teens .
